participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Energetic and adventurous, loves to have fun and enjoys spending time with friends.
participant_1.background: I just want to have fun with my friends. I don't drink or do drugs or anything. They're constantly on my back. I am 19 and I cannot wait to move out of my parents' home. I work a part-time job at Burger King.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Reflective and passionate about music, enjoys his profession but feels the weight of responsibility as a single dad.
participant_2.background: My ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. I'm a recording engineer and own my own studio. I prefer being inside. Whats up, I am a 46-year-old single dad with kids. I live in California but the recording artist market was dead last year.
